sentences.en: Another possible way to control juvenile - onset diabetes is the pancreas transplant.
sentences.cn: 控制少年期糖尿病的另一种可行的方法是胰腺移植.

sentences.en: Blindness is a common complication of diabetes.
sentences.cn: 失明是糖尿病常见的并发症。

sentences.en: But, if you haveidentical twins and one has Type 1 diabetes, the chances of the other one hasdiabetes is only about 40%.
sentences.cn: 但是，如果你有同卵双胞胎，并且一个有1型糖尿病，另一个也有糖尿病的机会只是大约40％。

sentences.en: Chromium supplements were used successfully in the treatment of diabetes (see Chapter 4).
sentences.cn: 铬补充剂被成功运用于治疗糖尿病（见第4章）。

sentences.en: Diabetes is caused by a fault in the insulin production of the body.
sentences.cn: 糖尿病是由体內胰岛素分泌失调引起的.

sentences.en: He suffered from diabetes and gastric ulcers.
sentences.cn: 他患有糖尿病和胃溃疡。

sentences.en: If you've got heart disease from ignoring the diabetes, they'll kill you.
sentences.cn: 你要是因为冷落了糖尿病而得上心脏病, 他俩会杀了你.

sentences.en: In case of diabetes, physicians advise against the use of sugar.
sentences.cn: 对于糖尿病患者, 医生告诫他们不要吃糖.

sentences.en: In diabetes the body produces insufficient insulin.
sentences.cn: 糖尿病患者体内不能分泌足够的胰岛素。

sentences.en: In the past, about a third of the babies born to women with diabetes were lost.
sentences.cn: 过去，患有糖尿病的女性生下的孩子中约有1/3夭折了。

sentences.en: It is like diabetes or asthma, an illness, due to a build up of pressures, which can happen to anyone.
sentences.cn: 就像是糖尿病或者哮喘，由于压力的形成，这种病有可能发生在任何人身上。

sentences.en: My doctor wants me to be tested for diabetes.
sentences.cn: 我的医生要我去做个检查，看是否患有糖尿病。

sentences.en: People with high blood pressure are especially vulnerable to diabetes.
sentences.cn: 有高血压的人尤其易患糖尿病。

sentences.en: Persons with diabetes suffer from improper metabolism of sugar.
sentences.cn: 糖尿病人的糖代谢受到阻碍.

sentences.en: Some people are genetically predisposed to diabetes.
sentences.cn: 有些人因遗传因素而易患糖尿病。

sentences.en: The poor old man was afflicted with diabetes.
sentences.cn: 那可怜的老人受到糖尿病的折磨.

sentences.en: We already knew that walking can reduce adult - onset diabetes and coronary heart disease.
sentences.cn: 我们已知道,散步能降低成人患糖尿病和冠心病的机会.

sentences.en: We can then translate this information into estimates of the current diabetes and cardiovascular disease that can be attributed to the rise in consumption of these drinks.
sentences.cn: 然后我们可以将这些信息转变成对当前糖尿病和冠心病的估计，而这些疾病是软饮料消耗量的增加所导致的。

sentences.en: You have diabetes, or liver or kidney disease.
sentences.cn: 有糖尿病，或者是有肝病或肾病者。

phrases.tran_cn: 妊娠（期）糖尿病；孕期糖尿病
青少年糖尿病；幼年型糖尿病

trans.tran_en: a serious disease in which there is too much sugar in your blood
